amendment.description: Amendment expresses the sense of Congress that the United States should consider applying to Syria sanctions which are currently enforced against Iran and Libya.
amendment.purpose: An amendment expressing that it is the sense of Congress that the U.S. should consider applying the same sanctions against Syria that are currently enforced against Iran and Libya unless Syria abandons its destabilizing policies in the Middle East.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Engel amendment (A023) Agreed to by recorded vote: 410 - 15 (Roll no. 172).
